events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering department based on your skills and experience related to software development.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to your application to assist you throughout the recruitment process.
The initial screening call was completed successfully. We discussed your background and technical skills relevant to the software engineer role.
Thank you for your timely and detailed response to our initial screening questions. Your enthusiasm for the role is appreciated.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-06-15T13:00:00Z with our senior software engineer to evaluate your coding and problem-solving skills.
You completed the technical interview successfully. The interview panel was impressed with your coding proficiency and system design knowledge.
An HR interview has been scheduled for 2024-06-18T11:00:00Z to discuss your fit with our company culture and the benefits package.
The HR interview went very well. Our HR team appreciates your alignment with our values and your enthusiasm for the position.
We have formally proposed an offer for the software engineer position, including salary details, benefits, and your expected start date.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer. We note your excitement about joining our engineering team and look forward to your response.
You have accepted the offer. Welcome to the team! We are excited to have you join our engineering department and contribute to our projects.
Your onboarding process has begun. We have scheduled orientation sessions and provided all necessary resources to integrate you smoothly.
The hiring process is now officially closed. Congratulations on joining us as a software engineer, and we wish you success in your new role.
